titles.title: Uniform Poll Closing Act of 1999
To establish a uniform closing time for the operation of polls on the date of the election of the President and Vice President.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 2/10/1999--Introduced. Uniform Poll Closing Act of 1999 - Establishes a uniform closing time for the operation of polls on the day of the presidential election.
